about.summary: Publish data sets, models, and other R objects, making it easy to share them across projects and with your colleagues. You can pin objects to a variety of "boards", including local folders (to share on a networked drive or with 'DropBox'), 'RStudio' connect, Amazon S3, and more.

Publish data sets, models, and other R objects, making it easy to share them across projects and with your colleagues. You can pin objects to a variety of "boards", including local folders (to share on a networked drive or with 'DropBox'), 'RStudio' connect, Amazon S3, and more.

name: r-pins
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pins
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/pins_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/pins/pins_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6689807e4dfaf93131473d04fc4f337c59996e6fae6b3d6cba85d69ff5f0aa0b

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-digest
    - r-ellipsis
    - r-filelock
    - r-fs
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-magrittr
    - r-mime
    - r-openssl
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang >=0.4.10
    - r-tibble
    - r-whisker
    - r-withr >=2.4.3
    - r-yaml
    - r-zip
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-digest
    - r-ellipsis
    - r-filelock
    - r-fs
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-httr
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-magrittr
    - r-mime
    - r-openssl
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang >=0.4.10
    - r-tibble
    - r-whisker
    - r-withr >=2.4.3
    - r-yaml
    - r-zip

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('pins')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('pins')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://pins.rstudio.com/, https://github.com/rstudio/pins
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.md
  license_family: APACHE
  summary: Publish data sets, models, and other R objects, making it easy to share them across projects and with your colleagues. You can pin objects to a variety of "boards", including local folders (to share on a networked drive or with 'DropBox'), 'RStudio' connect, Amazon S3, and more.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - mfansler

# Package: pins
# Title: Pin, Discover and Share Resources
# Version: 1.0.1
# Authors@R: c( person("Hadley", "Wickham", , "hadley@rstudio.com", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-4757-117X")), person("Javier", "Luraschi", , "jluraschi@gmail.com", role = "aut"), person(, "RStudio", role = "cph") )
# Description: Publish data sets, models, and other R objects, making it easy to share them across projects and with your colleagues. You can pin objects to a variety of "boards", including local folders (to share on a networked drive or with 'DropBox'), 'RStudio' connect, Amazon S3, and more.
# License: Apache License (>= 2)
# URL: https://pins.rstudio.com/, https://github.com/rstudio/pins
# BugReports: https://github.com/rstudio/pins/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.3.0)
# Imports: arrow, cli, digest, ellipsis, filelock, fs, glue, httr, jsonlite, lifecycle, magrittr, mime, openssl, rappdirs, rlang (>= 0.4.10), tibble, whisker, withr, yaml, zip
# Suggests: AzureStor, data.table, datasets, gitcreds, knitr, Microsoft365R, mockery, paws.storage, qs, R.utils, rmarkdown, rsconnect, shiny, testthat (>= 3.0.0), xml2
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# Config/testthat/edition: 3
# Encoding: UTF-8
